alert.note: Alert for Cherry; Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 4:54PM CDT until July 18 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Cherry County in north central Nebraska... Northeastern Sheridan County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... * Until 500 PM MDT. * At 353 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Clinton, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gordon, Clinton, Morgan Lake, Billys Lake, Lone Butte, Highway 27 crossing the Niobrara River, Rock Hill, Intersection of Highway 27 and Mills Road and Big Hill. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 93 and 112. Highway 61 between mile markers 202 and 204. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
